description:
Uplood allow you to share and save photos&videos from your Palm. Share them on the larger social networks (facebook ,...), by email, SMS, or directly html code to include your photos in your website. 

You can link your account to access your storage zone every where simply with a computer connected to internet with palm-save.uplood.fr

You can also redownload in your photo your stored photos&videos (this is a save of your stuff)

The photos are stored on our servers 
indefinitely.  
(photos stored in www.uplood.fr, video avaible on pre-live.uplood.tv)

If you like it, rate it !

There is a free version, limited to photos upload : Uplood Lite (on app catalog)

For any question or help : contact@uplood.fr
